text: 7:38 Aisaia 12:3; 58:11; Esekiel 47:1; Sekaraia 14:8Akar Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itim, a dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdim, an navir averiam gizɨvagh, fasfagh iram.’ ”7:38 Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven, akar otevir mam, akar Iesus vezɨn kamɨn mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, akar kam ko, aning magh ghuzir puvatɨ. Nɨ Aisaia 44:3 ko Aghuzir Akaba 18:4ɨn gan.
